title: Understanding Hybrid Deep Learning Models for Early Diagnosis of Alzheimer’s Disease

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Imaging Analysis Knowledge and Understanding of Machine Learning Concepts
context.additional_context: Course focusing on understanding operational principles and application cases of AI-based diagnostic models using medical imaging data

learning_goals: Learners can explain structural characteristics of a hybrid deep learning model (EfficientNet-B6 + LSTM) classifying Alzheimer’s disease diagnostic stages
Learners can analyze the impact of medical image preprocessing (normalization, augmentation, etc.) on model performance
Learners can discuss the clinical significance of spatial/sequential pattern analysis in MRI scans for early diagnosis
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
